section.heading: Murder in the second degree.
section.text: Whoever with malice aforethought, except as provided in §§ 22-2101, 22-2102, kills another, is guilty of murder in the second degree. For purposes of imprisonment following revocation of release authorized by § 24-403.01(b)(7), murder in the second degree is a Class A felony.

annotations.annotation: Furlough eligibility, persons convicted under this section, see § 24-251.02.
D.C. Law 13-302 added the last sentence.
